concept.title: Use Cellular Network of 4G Module
concept.shortdesc: If the 4G module is in “data mode”, you can visit the PBX web interface, register remote extensions, and connect the PBX and other device via the 4G network.

conbody.p:
To use cellular network of 4G, you need to configure the following settings:
Configure cellular network on 4G Module
Enable cellular network on the PBX
